description: Custom designed for your precious Samsung Galaxy Note 8 8.0 inch GT - N5100 / N5110 Android Tablet, this MoKo case features a combination of functionality and style. Well built to protect your Samsung Galaxy Note 8 8.0 inch GT - N5100 / N5110 Android Tablet for the years to come.Slim and Protective Cover made for Samsung Galaxy Note 8.0. Access to all features and controlsAutomatically wakes or puts your device to sleep when the lid is opened and closedPremium PU leather exterior and microfiber interior. Magnetic closure and Stylus loop. Device can be charged with case closed.Built in flip stand with typing and viewing angles. Interior hand strap for comfortable one-handed use.Lifetime warranty. Search "MoKo Note 8.0" for other styles and color options offered by MoKo.
title: MoKo Slim Cover Case for Samsung Galaxy Note 8.0 inch GT - N5100 Android Tablet, Black (with lip Stand, Integrated Elastic Hand Strap, and Stylus Loop)-Lifetime Warranty
